synonyms.synonym: Ubiquinol-cytochrome c reductase complex 6.4 kDa protein

protein.specific_function: This protein may be closely linked to the iron-sulfur protein in the complex and function as an iron-sulfur protein binding factor

go_class.description: monovalent inorganic cation transmembrane transporter activity
generation of precursor metabolites and energy
mitochondrial electron transport, ubiquinol to cytochrome c

reference.reference_text: Islam MM, Suzuki H, Yoneda M, Tanaka M: Primary structure of the smallest (6.4-kDa) subunit of human and bovine ubiquinol-cytochrome c reductase deduced from cDNA sequences. Biochem Mol Biol Int. 1997 May;41(6):1109-16.
